Hey <@!273808422753796097>, I found https://hackmd.io/@HWeNw8hNRimMm2m2GH56Cw/B1YJPGkpD the other day, read it a few times and a couple of questions popped up to my mind. I added them in the form of comments - I hope you don't mind and will find some time to go through them.

The doc itself is very, very nice.
